channel.title: Rate My Halo 3 Pic
channel.description:
Rate 1/10 And tell me how i can make it better
[IMG]http://i121.photobucket.com/albums/o218/Bigscape/Halo3.jpg[/img]

item.title: Rate My Halo 3 Pic
item.dc:creator: @exe626 exe626
item.description:
@exe626 wrote:

Never use brush strokes on the render, unless its for some type of design. Which in the case it wasn’t. I’d suggest making a background and the render *blend so that it **flows, don’t forget to add a light source, and create a sense of ***depth. The text could use some work also.

3/10
*What I mean by blending is, do you notice how the colors don’t match? Nothing is rolling together to look good.
**Flow kinda falls under the same category of blend.
***You want your artwork to seem as real as possible, blurring out further away things in the signature, making further away things darker(also the further from the light source, the darker you should make it).
Hope I helped ;D

Read full topic
